resources.string: Do I need an internet connection to use the app in the museum?
Yes, it is necessary for the proper functioning of the application.
How can I know what information is provided in the app about each artwork?

The app has a standard configuration that displays basic information about an artwork when a beacon is detected. By clicking on the + Information button, you can obtain more detailed and interesting information about the artwork.
Is the app available in multiple languages?
Currently, it is only available in Spanish and English, but future updates will include other languages such as French, Portuguese, and German.
How can I report technical issues or errors in the app?
On the home screen, there is a button in the bottom right corner in the shape of an envelope. This allows users to report any errors found in the app via email.
How can I find the beacons in the museum to use the app?
The beacons are strategically located next to each artwork, allowing the information about the artworks to be read as you visit the museum.
Does the app provide information about the history and culture behind the artworks?
Yes, by clicking on the + Information button, you will be shown more detailed information about each artwork.
Does the app require me to enable location on my mobile device to function?
Yes, for the proper functioning of the app, both location connectivity and Bluetooth are essential.
The app requires audio recording permission to function
The app is not functioning properly.
